newsitem.title: USA: US spot jet fuel falls with NYMEX, but diffs firm.
newsitem.headline: US spot jet fuel falls with NYMEX, but diffs firm.

text.p: U.S. spot jet fuel prices fell sharply Friday tracking September NYMEX futures, players said, although differentials firmed in both centers during light trade ahead of the long Labor Day weekend.

Gulf Coast aviation-quality 54-grade fuel was offered at about 1.75 cents above September futures, 0.25 cent firmer than Thursday diffs. Traders said low-sulfur 55-grade also firmed about 0.25 cent to about 2.0 cents over.

Players said New York 54-grade was offered at 4.50 cents over the print, also 0.25 cent firmer than Thursday diffs. NYMEX will be closed Monday for the U.S. Labor Day holiday. -- New York Energy Desk +1 212 859 1620
